# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate for the listener.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any NSXPCListenerDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If no delegate is set, all new connections are rejected. See the documentation for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSXPCListenerDelegate] for implementation details.
title: delegate
